text: 2. All new or re-provided parking spaces (in residential and nonresidential development) should be equipped with active electric vehicle charging facilities. a. When located on pavements, electric vehicle (EV) charging points should be integrated into the streetscape design and should not obstruct pedestrian movement. Where practicable, installation of EV charging points in the carriageway is preferred. 3. All new development proposals must deliver high-quality cycle parking in line with the London Plan and the London Cycling Design Standards. Developments will be required to ensure: a. cycle parking is well-located, safe, secure, and accessible, and provide a balance of short-stay and long-stay provision; b. cycle parking and storage caters to all types of cycles, including bicycles, adapted cycles, e-bikes, and cargo bikes, and;
